lines.text: Don't you walk away from me, you chalk-faced whore!

[after drowning Boots in a fish tank]
I sure hope they can get the smell out of those fish!

[to Debbie]
Why can't you snort it like the rest of us?

[while giving Ericka a beating]
Slimey pig-shit!
Don't call me warden, call me Fellini!
